ETCOP_TOOL.NAME: OpenAI File Downlader Tool
ETCOP_TOOL.DESCRIPTION: This tool receives a File ID of OpenAI and downloads the file. The Tool return the local path of the downloaded file in the local file system.

ETCOP_TOOL.NAME: Hello World Example Tool
ETCOP_TOOL.DESCRIPTION: This is the classic HelloWorld tool implementation.

ETCOP_TOOL.NAME: Hello World Example Multi-parameters Tool
ETCOP_TOOL.DESCRIPTION: This is the CustomHelloWorldMultiArgsTool tool implementation.
